display_long_description:
Step into the role of humanity’s last astronaut in this educational VR experience. After waking from cryosleep aboard a spaceship carrying rapeseed, you’ll learn how these seeds are the foundation of food, fuel, and life on a new planet. 

Guided by a witty, sarcastic robot, you’ll reconstruct seeds from fragmented data, experiment with different environmental conditions to find the best genetic traits, and organize them for planting. 

Along the way, you’ll explore concepts in plant biology, genetics, and space agriculture — all while engaging in interactive, hands-on puzzles that teach the science behind crop growth and survival in extreme conditions. Can you help humanity grow again?

The little robot will explain everything you need to do in the game. However, you can also ask it anything you want, because it's AI has been fed a lot of information, especially on the subject of plant research. So go ahead and ask it anything. But don't count on it telling good jokes!
